name: Creature Land Alpha
description:
Hi! i'm currently working on this game called Creature Land... this is an Alpha Version for it.

Use W/A/S/D keys to move and Spacebar to Jump. Use 'C' Key to Zoom/Scope. Click to break trees, open chest's and shoot bullets.

If you find any bugs please report them on our Discord server

This is an Alpha Version and there is alot more to add.

Bugs are obvious since this is an alpha version.

Created by: Zayn from CottonTail Studio

Assets by: Zayn

Enjoy and leave your feedback on our Discord server!
